name: debug-skill
description: Runtime debugging skill for AI coding agents

scripts.install-skill: for d in ~/.claude/skills ~/.codex/skills ~/.config/opencode/skill; do mkdir -p $d && rsync -a --delete debug-skill/ $d/debug/; done && echo 'Installed to ~/.claude/skills/debug, ~/.codex/skills/debug, ~/.config/opencode/skill/debug'

author: Vlad Tansky
